columns.name: vault_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the vault.

columns.name: creation_date
columns.description: The Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) date when the vault was created.

columns.name: last_inventory_date
columns.description: The Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) date when Amazon S3 Glacier completed the last vault inventory.

columns.name: number_of_archives
columns.description: The number of archives in the vault as of the last inventory date.

columns.name: size_in_bytes
columns.description: Total size, in bytes, of the archives in the vault as of the last inventory date.

columns.name: policy
columns.description: Contains the returned vault access policy as a JSON string.

columns.name: policy_std
columns.description: Contains the policy in a canonical form for easier searching.

columns.name: vault_lock_policy_std
columns.description: Contains the policy in a canonical form for easier searching.

columns.name: vault_notification_config
columns.description: Contains the notification configuration set on the vault.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags associated with the vault.
